keyMoments.title: Tracking Usopp's Blood Trail
keyMoments.description: Luffy and the crew follow a blood trail left by Usopp through the streets of Water 7, growing increasingly worried about their friend's safety.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's concern for his crew members and his determination to protect them.

keyMoments.title: Declares Money Doesn't Matter
keyMoments.description: Upon storming Franky House, Luffy makes it clear that recovering the money is no longer important - what matters is avenging what was done to Usopp.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's values as a captain, prioritizing his crew's well-being over material wealth.
keyMoments.quote: The money doesn't matter anymore. It's what you did to Usopp!

keyMoments.title: Gomu Gomu no Cannon First Use
keyMoments.description: Luffy debuts his Gomu Gomu no Cannon technique during the raid on Franky House, demonstrating a new powerful attack in his arsenal.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's continued development of his Devil Fruit abilities and combat techniques.

keyMoments.title: Decision to Say Goodbye to Going Merry
keyMoments.description: Luffy makes the heartbreaking decision that it's time to say goodbye to the Going Merry, accepting the harsh reality that their beloved ship can no longer sail.
keyMoments.significance: One of Luffy's most difficult decisions as captain, showing his growth in accepting painful truths and making hard choices for the crew's future.
keyMoments.quote: It's time... we have to say goodbye to Merry.

abilities.description: Luffy inflates his body and releases a devastating blast of air toward opponents.

keyMoments.title: Confronts Franky Family Alone
keyMoments.description: Usopp bravely goes to Franky House alone to demand the return of the 200 million berries stolen from him, despite being outnumbered and outmatched.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Usopp's determination to prove his worth to the crew and his willingness to fight despite his fears and insecurities.
keyMoments.quote: Give me back that money! It belongs to my crew!

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Franky
keyMoments.description: Franky easily dodges Usopp's attacks, mocks him, and delivers a devastating kick to his chin before leaving to spend the stolen money.
keyMoments.significance: This humiliating defeat deepens Usopp's insecurities about his strength and value to the crew, setting up his later emotional breakdown.

keyMoments.title: Brutally Beaten by Franky Family
keyMoments.description: After Franky leaves, the Franky Family members mercilessly beat Usopp, leaving him bloody and unconscious outside their hideout.
keyMoments.significance: One of the darkest moments for a Straw Hat crew member, this brutal beating becomes a turning point in the Water 7 arc and contributes to Usopp's crisis about his place in the crew.

reveals.information: Usopp's deep insecurities about his strength and worth to the crew are exposed through his solo confrontation with the Franky Family

keyMoments.title: Karasuma Gari Debut
keyMoments.description: Zoro demonstrates his new Santoryu technique, Karasuma Gari (Crow Demon Hunt), slicing through iron cannonballs with ease during the battle at Franky House.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Zoro's growth as a swordsman and his ability to cut through increasingly difficult materials.

abilities.description: A Santoryu technique where Zoro cuts through iron cannonballs and other hard materials.

keyMoments.title: Party Table Kick Course Debut
keyMoments.description: Sanji unleashes his Party Table Kick Course technique, delivering a devastating series of kicks to multiple Franky Family members simultaneously.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Sanji's refined fighting style and his ability to handle multiple opponents at once.

abilities.description: A powerful series of kicks that can strike multiple opponents simultaneously.

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Discovers Usopp's Blood Trail
keyMoments.description: Using his medical knowledge, Chopper identifies the blood trail left by Usopp and alerts the crew, allowing them to track their injured friend.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Chopper's value to the crew as both a doctor and tracker, using his skills to help rescue a crewmate.
keyMoments.quote: This is Usopp's blood! He must have gone to the Franky House alone!

keyMoments.title: Roseo Colonnade Debut
keyMoments.description: Chopper demonstrates his Roseo Colonnade technique during the raid on Franky House.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Chopper's continued development as a fighter and his contributions to major battles.

abilities.description: A powerful attack technique using Chopper's Devil Fruit transformation abilities.

keyMoments.title: Defeats Usopp
keyMoments.description: Franky easily dodges Usopp's attacks, mocks him for his weakness, and delivers a brutal kick to his chin before leaving with the stolen money.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Franky as a powerful antagonist and his callous attitude toward the Straw Hats at this point in the story.
keyMoments.quote: I'm going out shopping with the Straw Hats' money!

keyMoments.title: Boards the Sea Train
keyMoments.description: After leaving Franky House with the stolen money, Franky boards the Sea Train to go shopping.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up Franky's whereabouts for future episodes and introduces his connection to the Sea Train.

reveals.information: Franky demonstrates exceptional physical strength and durability, easily defeating Usopp

keyMoments.title: Introduced as Franky Family Member
keyMoments.description: Zambai is shown as one of the prominent members of the Franky Family, partying at Franky House after stealing the Straw Hats' money.
keyMoments.significance: First proper introduction to Zambai, who serves as Franky's right-hand man and will become an important ally later.

relationships.description: Zambai is Franky's right-hand man and most trusted member of the Franky Family.

keyMoments.title: Introduced as Square Sister
keyMoments.description: Kiwi appears as one half of the Square Sisters, distinctive members of the Franky Family known for their square hairstyles.
keyMoments.significance: First introduction to Kiwi, who along with her partner Mozu, are loyal members of the Franky Family.

relationships.description: Kiwi and Mozu work together as the Square Sisters, loyal members of the Franky Family.
Kiwi is extremely loyal to Franky and mimics his poses.

keyMoments.title: Introduced as Square Sister
keyMoments.description: Mozu appears as one half of the Square Sisters alongside Kiwi, both distinctive for their square-shaped hairstyles and loyalty to Franky.
keyMoments.significance: First introduction to Mozu, who forms a duo with Kiwi as dedicated members of the Franky Family.

relationships.description: Mozu and Kiwi work together as the Square Sisters, loyal members of the Franky Family.
Mozu is extremely loyal to Franky and mimics his poses.
